com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.xml

Class XMLDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ausregistry.jtoolkit2.xml.XMLDocument

  • public class XMLDocument
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of an XMLDocument is to provide a simple xpath evaluation interface for extracting node values from an XML document. Where the names of elements are known in advance, non DOM-specific methods should be used in order to reduce the dependency of client classes on the DOM interface.
